module.name: Text To Speech
module.description: Allows you to configure text to speech, and is derived from texttospeech provided in contributed modules.
module.changelog: 2.11.0.3 Fixed primary key issue 2.11.0.2 re #6386 - correct typo in install.php so the sql query is run, also remove uninstall.sql and use uninstall.php 2.11.0.1 Fixes #6386, use install.php, remove install.sql. Return false on install if agi cant be installed 2.11.0.0 Re-categorize 2.10.0.2 Security update; downstream changes 2.10.0.1 Security update; downstream changes *2.10.0.0* version bump
